div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Vol.XVII, No. 91, April 23, 1906HELP! HELP!

body.p: The citizens of Chicago are urged to make cash contributions immediately for the sufferers in San Francisco and other stricken towns which were victims of an earthquake which took place April 18, 1906 at 5:15 A.M.
Contributions may be deposited at the State street stores, the newspaper offices, or sent to David R. Forgan, First National Bank, treasurer of the Chicago Commercial Association.
